description: net/http: fix target to reflect package reorganisation

messages.text:
Is this a patch for 5340050?

-- Mikio


On Nov 6, 2011, at 1:31 PM, dave@cheney.net wrote:

> Reviewers: r, bradfitz,
> 
> Message:
> Hello r@golang.org, bradfitz@golang.org (cc:
> golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
> 
> 
> Description:
> net/http: fix target to reflect package reorganisation
> 
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/5347046/
> 
> Affected files:
>  M src/pkg/net/http/Makefile
> 
> 
> Index: src/pkg/net/http/Makefile
> ===================================================================
> --- a/src/pkg/net/http/Makefile
> +++ b/src/pkg/net/http/Makefile
> @@ -4,7 +4,7 @@
> 
> include ../../../Make.inc
> 
> -TARG=http
> +TARG=net/http
> GOFILES=\
>    chunked.go\
>    client.go\
> 
>

Hello r@golang.org, bradfitz@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
